channel.title: F3d
channel.description:
Made this about a year ago, i guess ill post it for you guys to fuck around with etc. Ill also be happy to provide bits and pieces of the source code if needed, but the code is nasty. I optimized it a while back and there were great improvements in speed, then i lost it when switching laptops. So i only have the slow version currently.
Also, this isn't meant for RS models. Its just that they have so many colors and polys it would be a challenge to practice loading them than cubes..
[u][b]Includes:[/b][/u]
[ul][li]Backface culling[/li] [li]Z-Depth sorting[/li] [li]Grid[/li] [li]Axis[/li] [li]Simple loading UI[/li] [li]Simple Rotation[/li] [li]Wireframe[/li] [li]Perspective - not included in the download[/li][/ul]
[img]http://img29.imageshack.us/img29/4691/perspective.png[/img]
[img]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/7598/viewerstuffqk2.png[/img]
[img]http://img7.imageshack.us/img7/102/screeniefinalpt3.png[/img]
[img]http://img12.imageshack.us/img12/1007/worldfacedz6.png[/img]
Model viewer i started to make using my engine, never finished: [img]http://img18.imageshack.us/img18/7051/rsmcmm7.png[/img]
The engine was also used in my last program i've made: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,381920.0.html
[img]http://img199.imageshack.us/img199/4200/prevpus.png[/img] [img]http://img190.imageshack.us/img190/3906/rigrig.png[/img]

item.title: F3d
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Made this about a year ago, i guess ill post it for you guys to fuck around with etc. Ill also be happy to provide bits and pieces of the source code if needed, but the code is nasty. I optimized it a while back and there were great improvements in speed, then i lost it when switching laptops. So i only have the slow version currently.

Also, this isn’t meant for RS models. Its just that they have so many colors and polys it would be a challenge to practice loading them than cubes…

Includes:

[ul][li]Backface culling[/li]
[li]Z-Depth sorting[/li]
[li]Grid[/li]
[li]Axis[/li]
[li]Simple loading UI[/li]

[li]Perspective - not included in the download[/li][/ul]
